/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by towering buildings and lush greenery, creating a harmonious blend of man-made structures and nature. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, punctuated by the radiant sun. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the cityscape.
